activities.name: Get Config Value in Clound Storage

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT VAL1, VAL3, VAL4, NULLIF(VAL7,'''') AS VAL7 from ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_CURRENT c WHERE c.LOV_TYPE= ''',variables('lovType'),''' AND c.LOV_NAME = ''',variables('lovName'),''' AND c.ACTIVE_FLG =''Y''')

text.value:
@concat('DELETE FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE_CREDIT_GRADE 
    WHERE FILE_ID IN(SELECT FILE_ID 
                        FROM ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_TEMP_FILE 
                        WHERE STATUS = ''S'' 
                        AND FILE_TYPE = ''',variables('FILE_TYPE'),''')')

activities.name: If Configval is nul or Some Config val is Null

dependsOn.activity: Get Config Value in Clound Storage

expression.value: @or(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output),'firstRow')),or(or(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,'')))),empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,'')))))

value.value: @if(empty(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7),'',activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val7)

ifTrueActivities.name: insert error when config val error

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_REVIEW 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	REVIEW_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('REVIEW_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('lovType'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('lovName'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val1,''))),',Input path(val1)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val3,''))),',Prefix Input file(val3)',''),if(empty(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value in Clound Storage').output.firstRow.val4,''))),',file type Input file(val4)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')

expression.value: @or(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config value').output),'firstRow')),or(or(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null)),equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null)))

ScriptCount.value:
@concat('SELECT COUNT(T.LINE) AS COUNT FROM (SELECT ''02|''+ CONCAT(ROW_ID ,''|'',CREATED ,''|'',CREATED_BY ,''|'',LAST_UPD,''|'',LAST_UPD_BY 
				,''|'',ACCNT_NO ,''|'',ACCNT_CATEGORY ,''|'',ACCNT_SUB_CATEGORY ,''|'',BILL_NAME ,''|'',BILL_CYCLE 
				,''|'',INVOICING_COMPANY ,''|'',PAYMENT_METHOD ,''|'',MASTER_ACCNT_ID ,''|'',STATUS_CD 
				,''|'',BILLING_STATUS_CD ,''|'',REGISTER_DT ,''|'',ARPU ,''|'',CREDIT_GRADE ,''|'',DEBT_NEGO_FLG 
				,''|'',PAYMENT_FLAG) as LINE FROM CREDIT.TEST_CC_BILLING tcb ) T;')

parameters.messageWhenCountZero: Query Billing account no for send billing account no to sff data not found

ifTrueActivities.name: insert error when config val error

text.value:
@concat('INSERT INTO ',variables('SCHEMA'),'.CC_DATA_FACTORY 
	(CREATED,
	CREATED_BY,
	LAST_UPD,
	LAST_UPD_BY,
	DATA_TYPE,
	STATUS,
	DESCRIPTION) VALUES (CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),'''
	,convertTimeZone(utcNow(),'UTC','SE Asia Standard Time'),'''),
	''',variables('CREDIT_USER'),''',
	''',variables('DATA_TYPE'),''',
	''E'',''',
	if(not(contains(string(activity('Get Config Value').output),'firstRow')),concat('Config LOV_TYPE : ',variables('LOV_TYPE'),' ,LOV_NAME : ',variables('LOV_NAME'),' Data not found.'),concat('Config ',
	if(startswith(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	,','),substring(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	,1,sub(length(
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	),1)),
	concat(if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL2),null),',Output path(VAL2)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL5),null),',Prefix Output path(VAL5)',''),if(equals(if(equals(trim(coalesce(activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6,'')),''),null,activity('Get Config Value').output.firstRow.VAL6),null),',file type Output path(VAL6)',''))
	)
	,' Data not found.')),''');')
